definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: The ah, China, really is a troublous times this year.
sentences.chinese: 哎，中國，今年實在是多事之秋。

sentences.english: A Christmas tree was placed in the comer of the brilliant hall. How beautiful it was!
sentences.chinese: 聖誕樹放在燈火通明的客廳的一角，實在是太莢了。

sentences.english: "The actions of one soldier were nothing more than criminal behavior," Hammond said.
sentences.chinese: “這名士兵的行爲是實實在在的犯罪，”哈蒙德說。

sentences.english: He like dogs, but I can never stand the yelping.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡狗，但我實在受不了那汪汪的叫聲。

sentences.english: Some practices in the China Church are difficult for people to understand.
sentences.chinese: 中國天主教會里面有一些做法讓人實在看不懂。

sentences.english: Upon my word, I've never heard of such a thing.
sentences.chinese: 說實在話，我從未聽說過這種事情。

sentences.english: It is a true dilemma," wrote Moon Chang-keuk, a columnist at South Korea's JoongAng Ilbo newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 所以這是一個實實在在的兩難。

sentences.english: They refused to provide the judge with a scale of values not contained in the positive law.
sentences.chinese: 他們拒絕爲法官提供實在法所未規定的任何價值標準。

sentences.english: Earlier today, he even made her a cup of tea, which still appears to be a novelty for all involved.
sentences.chinese: 今早他甚至爲媽媽衝了一杯茶，這實在是前所未有。

sentences.english: I can't, I can't do this. I'm so excited that I can't eat lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我實在太興奮了，以至於我都沒法喫午餐了。

sentences.english: The pictures came out AWESOME, as evidenced by my husband’s reaction.
sentences.chinese: 老公的反應證實照片實在太棒了。

sentences.english: These scenes where the characters actually are running for their lives are terrifying.
sentences.chinese: 這些角色正在爲他們的生命奔跑的場景實在可怕。

sentences.english: These luxury candles are too good to burn. D. L. & Co.
sentences.chinese: 這些奢侈至極的蠟燭實在不忍將其點燃。

sentences.english: Ya I remember I was really an awkward kid.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，記得我從前實在是個笨小孩。

sentences.english: So he hold his realism by developing his theory on verisimilitude.
sentences.chinese: 這樣他就藉助逼真性觀念堅持了自己的實在論。

sentences.english: These clothes aren't really suited to a tropical climate.
sentences.chinese: 在熱帶氣候區這種衣服實在不合適。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
